Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.communication.socket

Class SocketServerCommunicationInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.communication.socket.SocketServerCommunicationInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerCommunicationInterface
    public class SocketServerCommunicationInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerCommunicationInterface
    A SocketClientCommunicationInterface offers a transparent way to send and receive NetworkMessages via the Socket protocol. To achieve such goal, this class implements the ServerCommunicationInterface interface.
    See Also:
    ServerCommunicationInterface

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.io.ObjectInputStream in
      The standard input stream used to receive NetworkMessages from the remote Server.
      private java.io.ObjectOutputStream out
      The standard output stream used to send NetworkMessages to the remote Server.
      private java.net.Socket socket
      The Socket instance belonging to the current client session.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SocketServerCommunicationInterface

        public SocketServerCommunicationInterface​(java.lang.String hostAddress,
                                          int port)
                                   throws ConnectionException
        This is the only constructor. It creates a new SocketServerCommunicationInterface from the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        hostAddress - the remote Server ip address to connect to.
        port - the remote Server port to listen from.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if any lower level socket exception is thrown by the input and output streams.

    • Method Detail

      • closeConnection

        private void closeConnection()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Safely closes the socket connection and terminate the current session
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if some error occurs during the closing procedure

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(NetworkMessage message)
                 throws ConnectionException
        Sends a given NetworkMessage through an ObjectOutputStream stream using the Socket protocol.
        Specified by:
        sendMessage in interface ServerCommunicationInterface
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be sent.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if any exception is thrown by the output stream.

      • nextMessage

        public NetworkMessage nextMessage()
                           throws ConnectionException
        Reads an incoming NetworkMessage from the ObjectInputStream stream using the Socket protocol.
        Specified by:
        nextMessage in interface ServerCommunicationInterface
        Returns:
        the incoming NetworkMessage.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if any exception is thrown by the input stream.
